description: An Agentic Knowledge Graph for monitoring, analyzing, and enhancing user behavior and trust. This KG dynamically processes user interaction data, sentiment analysis, and trust metrics to adjust system responses in real time. It leverages blockchain‑audited microtransactions and decentralized governance to ensure transparent, adaptive, and user‑centered decision‑support.

trainingExamples.input: Analyze user interaction logs to determine trust score for a new feature.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: Trust score: 85 with recommendations for improvement.
trainingExamples.description: User trust scoring from interaction data.

trainingExamples.input: Identify negative sentiment trends in recent feedback.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: Detected sentiment score: 30 with suggested interventions.

evaluationExamples.input: Evaluate the overall trustworthiness of user engagement on the platform.
evaluationExamples.expectedOutput: Composite trust score of 80 with detailed breakdown.
evaluationExamples.description: Evaluation example for overall trust assessment.

finalExamExamples.input: Generate a comprehensive report on user behavior and trust dynamics over the past quarter, including actionable insights.
finalExamExamples.expectedOutput: Detailed report with trust metrics, sentiment analysis, and improvement recommendations.
finalExamExamples.description: Final exam: comprehensive user behavior and trust analysis.

agents.name: BaseBehaviorAgent
agents.description: Extracts fundamental user interaction data and standardizes it for analysis.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: TrustAnalysisAgent
agents.description: Analyzes user interaction data and feedback to compute a trust score based on sentiment and engagement patterns.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: SentimentAnalysisAgent
agents.description: Evaluates textual feedback to determine user sentiment and detect trends.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

agents.name: DynamicCompositeTrustAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple behavior and sentiment agents to generate a comprehensive trust evaluation.

approvalCriteria.ethicsGuidelines: Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards.

metadata.notes: This User Behavior and Trust KG dynamically evaluates user interaction data, sentiment, and trust metrics. It employs adaptive agent generation to monitor and enhance user experience and trust, while blockchain‑audited microtransactions and decentralized governance ensure transparent monetization and continuous improvement.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on user engagement and trust risk
